p: Any cat from 3 shelters was included if necropsy was performed within 6 hours from death. Liver, kidney, spleen and bile were obtained during necropsy. Clinical and laboratory results were retrieved from available medical archives. AA‐amyloid was identified in tissues by hematoxylin‐eosin and Congo‐red staining, and confirmed by immunoblotting. Shedding of amyloid fibrils was investigated with immunoblotting in bile samples. Descriptive statistics and non‐parametric tests were used.
